definition: mouth/classifier for things with mouths (people, domestic animals, cannons, wells etc)/classifier for bites or mouthfuls
cavity of body/barrel (e.g. engine cylinder)/compartment/tune/accent of speech
stomatitis/ulceration of oral cavity/inflammation of the mucous lining of the mouth

sentences.english: You can also brush the roof of your mouth.
sentences.chinese: 你也可以刷下口腔的頂部。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the local mechanism of caries prevention of fluoridated milk.
sentences.chinese: 目的探索氟化牛奶在口腔局部的防齲作用機制。

sentences.english: The present invention also provides a method for making a removable prosthodontic device.
sentences.chinese: 本發明還提供了製備可移動的口腔修復裝置的方法。

sentences.english: So, the oral stage is when you start off.
It works by turning the sounds of the dental consulting room into a digital signal.
sentences.chinese: 它的工作原理是將口腔診室內的聲音轉化爲數字信號。

sentences.english: Conclusions Thrush was well prevented with 2% sodium bicarbonate.
sentences.chinese: 結論2%碳酸氫鈉清洗口腔可預防鵝口瘡。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the effect of prevention of thrush by oral nursing with 2%sodium bicarbonate.
sentences.chinese: 目的觀察2%碳酸氫鈉清洗口腔預防鵝口瘡的效果。

sentences.english: The main symptom is creamy white legions in the mouth that can be scraped away.
sentences.chinese: 其主要症狀是在口腔中產生大量可刮除的乳白色物體。

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate the effect of drug on chemical degradation of lipopolysaccharide (LPS) from oral anaerobes.
sentences.chinese: 目的評估各種藥物對口腔厭氧菌內毒素的降解作用。

sentences.english: It could make him, as the phrase goes, into an oral person.
sentences.chinese: 會使孩子形成所謂的口腔期人格。

sentences.english: Implant supported denture has been more and more often used to restore the loosing teeth.
sentences.chinese: 種植義齒愈來愈多應用於口腔修復領域。

sentences.english: Can cyst of oral cavity mucous membrane worsen?
sentences.chinese: 口腔粘膜囊腫會不會惡化？

sentences.english: Modern oral implantology was given birth in the middle of 20 century.
sentences.chinese: 現代口腔種植學始於20世紀中葉。

sentences.english: Lidocaine is also prescribed for people with very sore throats and those with canker sores in the mouth.
sentences.chinese: 利多卡因也用於喉嚨痛和口腔潰瘍患者。

sentences.english: Radiation in the mouth is one of the most brutal of cancer treatments.
sentences.chinese: 口腔化療是最讓人難以忍受的癌症治療手段之一。

sentences.english: Talk and laugh with Hongru, contacts without STOMATOLOGY.
sentences.chinese: 對話與鴻儒笑，沒有口腔醫學接觸。

definition: esophagus/the proper way to eat/food transportation route
tongue/CL:個|个[ge4]/enemy soldier captured for the purpose of extracting information
